name: SHREK'S FUNDERLAND!
description:
A challenging maze game where you must use strategy to avoid Shrek and escape Ogre Land. PREPARE TO GET SHREK'ED! A new game in the shrek's wonderland series. You cannot escape shrek, he's too strong for you! This is a Shrek-themed psychological horror game. Your goal is to locate the shrek stone on every level and walk into it to collect it, and you will be teleported to the next level. Reach the final level and escape shrek's  mega maze to win.  ***And this game has sudden loud noises, and... images too. BTW!*** SHREK IS COMING AAA!! XD. Lol.

"This game makes me feel like I'm constantly cursed." - Anonymous.
